mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (created_at ,modified_at,is_delete , contents, qna_status, title, view_count, user_id) VALUES (now(), now(), 0, #{contents}, 0, #{title}, 0, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT q.*, qc.qna_comment_id AS qnaCommentId, qc.comment AS comment, (SELECT COUNT(qr.qna_comment_id) FROM qna_reply qr WHERE qr.qna_comment_id = qc.qna_comment_id) AS qnaReplyCount FROM qna q LEFT JOIN qna_comment qc ON q.qna_id = qc.qna_id WHERE q.qna_id = #{qnaId} LIMIT 1
select user_id from qna where qna_id = #{qndId} and is_delete = false
